name: quizwiz-app
description: Professional quiz application with user progress tracking

scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && docker run -d --name mongodb -p 27017:27017 mongo:latest && sleep 3 && npm run load-questions
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop mongodb && docker rm mongodb
